content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of three parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace (x=1, y=1) with burner inserter (x=1.5, y=2.5) outputting to chest (x=1.5, y=3.5)
- Furnace (x=3, y=1) with burner inserter (x=3.5, y=2.5) outputting to chest (x=3.5, y=3.5)
- Empty furnace setup with burner inserter (x=5.5, y=2.5) outputting to chest (x=5.5, y=3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace (x=2, y=7) with burner inserter (x=2.5, y=8.5) outputting to chest (x=2.5, y=9.5)
- Furnace (x=4, y=7) with burner inserter (x=4.5, y=8.5) outputting to chest (x=4.5, y=9.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line (x=11.5-14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (x=14.5, y=11.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter (x=14.5, y=12.5) feeding assembling machine
- Assembling machine (x=14.5, y=14.5) producing copper cable
- Output burner inserter (x=12.5, y=14.5) moving cables to storage chest (x=11.5, y=14.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5-13.5, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=2.5, y=35.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler (x=7, y=35.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine (x=13.5, y=35.5) generating electricity
- Electricity distribution network with multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Research-related errors
- Check if a technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Use appropriate API calls to verify research status before setting new research

### Assembly Machine Operation
- Ensure consistent supply of ingredients to prevent ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE status
- Monitor output storage capacity to prevent FULL_OUTPUT status

### Fluid System Setup
- Some offshore pumps are not connected properly to the fluid network (warnings about no fluid present)
- Ensure proper connection of all fluid-carrying entities through pipes

### Resource Management
- Multiple furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients
- Implement better resource distribution system to keep production lines active
